憿憿憿
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

憿字的基本解释

憿
jiǎo
〔憿幸〕古同“侥幸”，由于偶然的原因而得到成功或免去灾害。
〔憿憭〕以诚相告。

憿
jǐ
快速。

憿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《集韻》吉歷切，入錫，見。］
(1)疾速。参见“憿絶”、“憿糴”。
(2)通“激”。

憿字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憿； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页405第08
【唐韻】古堯切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】堅堯切，?音驍。【說文】幸也。亦作激。通作僥徼。　又【五音集韻】輕皎切，音磽。義同。　又【集韻】吉了切，音皎。憿憭，以誠告也。　又【集韻】【類篇】?吉歷切，音激。疾也。或書作㦘。

憿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
憿字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
jiǎo
[Fortunately] Gu Tong was "lucky", because of accidental reasons, he succeeded or avoided disasters.
[Xin Xin] Tell me with sincerity.
Squeeze
jǐ
fast.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jī］
["Jiyun" Jili cut, enter the tin, see. ]
(1) Fast. See "Lian Jue", "Lian Liao".
(2) Through "excitation".
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憿; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 405 08
【Tang Yun】Gu Yaoqie 【Jiyun】【Yunhui】【Zhengyun】Strong Yaoqie,? Yinxiao. [Said the text] Fortunately. Also excited. Pass as a flirt.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Light Jiaoqie, sound 硗. The same meaning.　[Ji Yun] Good luck cut, Yin Jiao. Xin Xin, tell me sincerely.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Ji Liqie, sound excitement. Disease also. Or book as 㦘.
Squeeze
